TopicTitle: Advanced Grabbing Unit (AGU) (The Klaw) needs improvement

Articles.Content:
In the current version, 1.3.1, the AGU is very hard to use. Specially in missions where you need to recover parts from space.

The problem is that it requires a very small angle range to catch the target. For big ships or asteroids, it is not hard, but for small parts, it is.

In the part.cfg, I changed captureMinFwdDot to zero. Now it works just fine for grabbing floating parts.

So, I suggest that this parameter should be lowered. Maybe it does not need to be zero to work, but it needs to be lowered.
I support this. If it does not require hours of work to fix, and only needs a few minutes to fix, i have absolutely nothing against it.
I think that in some cases you want a low angle, maybe make that value adjustable
Put it on a tweakable. At least make it available to advanced tweakables.
Perhaps make it so there are different tiers of grabbing units with diffrent angles? It doesn't really make sensr that the node containing ARM is a dead end.
